general_advisory: 1. For Kharif paddy cultivation, use good quality seeds. 2. Regular monitoring of vegetable crops for insect pest attack. 3. Recommended treatments for BLB & Blast in paddy nursery stage.

advisory: Prevailing weather condition may increase the chances of BLB & Blast in nursery stage so recommended treatments.
Current rainy weather is favourable for insect pest attack like semilooper, Bihari hair caterpillar. Control by spraying Lamba cyhalothrin 4.9CS.
Wrapping and propping recommended. To control early shot borer, foliar spray of Fipronil 5SC advised.
Prevent wilt & diseases in main field with spraying of Tebuconazole. Regular monitoring for insect pest attack. Mealy bug control in okra & brinjal with Thiamethoxam spraying.
Stock carp like Rohu, Catla and Mrigal in specific ratio for benefits. Maintain standard stocking density and provide recommended feed.
Vaccination against diseases is crucial. Regular mineral mixture along with salt is advised. Winter ration should include wheat grains, jaggery, etc. for energy requirement.
